name: Awesome Maze: Round World VR
description:
Guide the ball through the dangerous maze projected onto the inner surface of a sphere. Control it with your head in virtual reality. 
Improve your time, avoid obstacles, balance between speed and caution.

• interactive world
• 20 levels

Tips:
• If you have display issue you may need to calibrate your phone for VR headset
http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/
• For samsung Gear VR please donwload this app before : 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kunkunsoft.cardboardappforgear...
